DOC.detailed_description: Intervention : - Study A : Subjects biopsy proven sarcoidosis suspect cardiac involvement ( prone arrhythmia , cardiac failure , unexplained dyspnea ) study twice : 1 ) 18-FDG PET precede 12 hour fast 2 ) 18-FDG PET perform 2 hour somatostatin blockade ( 300 microgram/hour ) /Heparin infusion . - Study B : Subjects biopsy proven sarcoidosis suspect cardiac involvement study twice : 1 ) 18-FDG PET precede 12 hour fast 2 ) 68Ga-DOTANOC PET precede least 6 hour fast .
